record.title: RECESS UNTIL TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 20, 2007
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 20, 2007 -- (Senate - November 16, 2007)

[Page: S14661]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I now ask unanimous consent the Senate stand in recess under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 1:54 p.m., recessed until Tuesday, November 20, 2007, at 9 a.m.
